title: Arsy high-rise velvet jeans
text:
Isabel Marant Étoile's pink Arsy jeans are cut to a retro-inspired silhouette from soft stretch-cotton velvet. They feature five pockets and are shaped to a flattering tapered leg. Team them with the matching double-breasted blazer for a coordinated look.
